title: Customer Support Specialist
job_overview:
As a Customer Support Specialist, you will be the voice of our brand, responsible for providing top-notch support to our customers. You will handle inquiries, resolve issues, and ensure that every customer interaction is positive and efficient. The ideal candidate should have experience in e-commerce customer service and be able to navigate fast-paced environments while maintaining a calm and professional demeanor.

We are looking for someone who has worked with e-commerce brands or online stores and understands the importance of delivering exceptional customer support that drives loyalty and satisfaction.

Key Responsibilities:

Respond to customer inquiries via email, live chat, and social media, providing clear, helpful, and timely support.

Resolve customer issues related to orders, shipping, returns, and product information, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.

Manage and follow up on customer feedback and complaints, ensuring that all issues are resolved promptly and effectively.

Work with the team to identify recurring issues or concerns, suggesting improvements to processes or policies as needed.

Keep accurate records of customer interactions and transactions, tracking issues and resolutions in the customer support system.

Collaborate with other teams (e.g., fulfillment, marketing) to address customer concerns and ensure smooth order fulfillment.

Assist with product inquiries and recommendations, enhancing the customerâ€™s shopping experience.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a Customer Support Specialist in e-commerce or with e-commerce brands.

Strong written and verbal communication skills, with a focus on clear and empathetic responses.

Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time effectively in a fast-paced environment.

Experience with customer support tools (e.g., Zendesk, Freshdesk, Shopify) and CRM software.

Knowledge of e-commerce platforms and order fulfillment processes.

Strong problem-solving skills with a customer-first mindset.

Ability to work independently, stay organized, and meet deadlines.

Previous experience handling customer support in a remote setting is a plus.

How to Apply:
To apply for this position, please include a list of the brands / stores where your previous experience in e-commerce customer support comes from. 

Specifically, share examples of your role in solving customer issues, how you communicated with clients, and how you ensured their satisfaction for the brands / stores.
